entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Mascouche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:33 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
